Algorithm

Class Boxinfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithm.Boxinfo

  • public class Boxinfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class contains all the info of the boxes in the game and checks for every point the other points it can see
    Author:
    Chen Ostrovski, Ester Reznikov

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Boxinfo(Robot.Play play)
      This constructor creates a new Boxinfo contains all the info of the play

      This function checks which points every point can see ( not blocked by box)
      static java.util.ArrayList<Geom.Point3D> points(java.util.ArrayList<Geom.Point3D[]> boxes)

      • vaildpoint
